pullrequest.title: New atlas v5 meshes and materials.

content.raw:
Looks good! I think the collision shapes are ready. v5 still falls over upon startup, though :/ Should we attempt to tune the joint PIDs before release?

Nevermind--it stands with a merge from atlas_v5 because the new standing pose is wide enough (though it is a tad wobbly)
